title: what typefaces are these??
content:
this is a poster from aesthetic apparatus.  
anyone know the fonts??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091015014510im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/D88C39_fullsize_6273.JPG)
author: ramonNYC

comments.content: AA are big fans of [Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20091015014510/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Hoefler%252B%252526%252BFrere-Jones) so I would bet on Knockout and Cyclone.
